item.title: Haskell笔记(1)
item.description: Boolean Algebra & Equality 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 True && False --False True || False --True not True --False 21 == 21 --True "Hello" == "Hello" --True "Hello" == 123 --Error 5 /= 7 --True, not equal to functions succ returns following item in an enumeration 1 2 3 4 succ 5 --6 succ 'a' --b succ 60 * 3 --183 -> 61 * 3 succ
